channel.title: How to change system message at login 317
channel.description: i want to change the login message u know where it says welcom blah blah blah well i want to change that but how? please dont flame this is 317

item.title: How to change system message at login 317
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Old spice, post:6, topic:351976”][quote author=pokemonn link=topic=448329.msg3290071#msg3290071 date=1280497242]
im going to try now do i need to compile by chance? just wondering
[/quote]

look, whenever you’ve edited client.java, your going to need to compile for the changes to take effect.[/quote]or any .java files.
@Ontopic:
Search the message you get in client.java and change it

Read full topic
item.source: How to change system message at login 317

im going to try now do i need to compile by chance? just wondering

item.title: How to change system message at login 317
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Uhmm… That’s for a 508… he has a 317, so you would go to client.java and search whatever it says when u log in and just change it to what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change system message at login 317
item.dc:creator: @maximee9 maximee9
item.description:
@maximee9 wrote:

go to login. java, then search for the message (for me its: welcome to batmanscape)
when u find it, change it, then compile, run server and u done
